reasoning: Candidate demonstrates exceptional ability through multiple top-conference publications (NeurIPS, ACL) on agentic self-improvement (TT-SI, ToolRL) and evaluation frameworks (TD-Eval), with code releases and leaderboards showing hands-on building. Technical depth evident in detailed findings on uncertainty-guided adaptation, ablations, and RL methods, aligning with xAI's focus on LLMs, reasoning, and optimization. Strong mission fit in self-evolving agents and agentic learning, though more academic than production-scale engineering.
exceptional_work: TT-SI: Test-time self-improvement algorithm enabling LLM agents to adapt using uncertainty-guided data generation and one-shot updates, outperforming SFT with 68x less data; ToolRL for agentic learning; TD-Eval framework with released code/leaderboard.
